attributes.action: Save Barclays Bank Soho road, Birmingham
attributes.additional_details: It provides vital banking facilities for many businesses and the community. We live in a primarily elderly based community which rely on traditional banking methods.
attributes.background: We would like the Barclays Bank Branch on Soho road, birmingham to remain open.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about bank closures are a matter for individual banks, not the UK Government or Parliament.
